rows.label: qst201701_msg0030
rows.name: *huff*... *huff*...

rows.label: qst201701_msg0001
rows.name:
What are you doing?! Move it!
On the battlefield, the one who
stops is the first to die!

rows.label: qst201701_msg0002
rows.name:
Mattragh, do it again! You won't
survive with movements like that!

rows.label: qst201701_msg0031
rows.name: N-No way...

rows.label: qst201701_msg0003
rows.name: You're working them hard, Captain.

rows.label: qst201701_msg0004
rows.name: S-Special Inquisitor Meleph!

rows.label: qst201701_msg0005
rows.name:
Do Superbian soldiers train
like this every day?

rows.label: qst201701_msg0006
rows.name: Sir!

rows.label: qst201701_msg0007
rows.name:
A soldier must always train
to be ready to act at a moment's
notice in an emergency.

rows.label: qst201701_msg0008
rows.name: Wow, being a soldier is tough.

rows.label: qst201701_msg0009
rows.name: ...This is lax, sir.

rows.label: qst201701_msg0010
rows.name: Lax?

rows.label: qst201701_msg0011
rows.name:
Yes, sir! This kind of training
doesn't even count as a warm-up, sir!

rows.label: qst201701_msg0012
rows.name: Our training is a warm-up?!

rows.label: qst201701_msg0013
rows.name:
Meleph-dono, may I participate
in the training, sir?

rows.label: qst201701_msg0014
rows.name:
I will show these soldiers what
true training is all about!

rows.label: qst201701_msg0015
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: qst201701_msg0016
rows.name:
Wait, Newt. You're not
a Superbian soldier.

rows.label: qst201701_msg0017
rows.name:
If an outsider just jumps
in, it'll be a nuisance
to the other soldiers.

rows.label: qst201701_msg0018
rows.name:
It is true that Newt is not
affiliated with the Superbian army.

rows.label: qst201701_msg0019
rows.name: But, Meleph-dono...?

rows.label: qst201701_msg0020
rows.name:
However, her combat skills
are top-notch. I'm sure the
soldiers could learn much.

rows.label: qst201701_msg0021
rows.name:
B-Being praised by Meleph-dono...
I am deeply moved, sir!

rows.label: qst201701_msg0022
rows.name:
I will devote my entire
being to this mission, sir!

rows.label: qst201701_msg0023
rows.name:
Then, first, let's have a
mock battle between the
Superbian soldiers and us, sir!

rows.label: qst201701_msg0024
rows.name: A mock battle...?

rows.label: qst201701_msg0025
rows.name:
Yes, sir. First, you must
know your own strength, sir.

rows.label: qst201701_msg0026
rows.name: Huh? We're participating too?!

rows.label: qst201701_msg0027
rows.name: ...Understood.

rows.label: qst201701_msg0028
rows.name:
However, even if it is a mock
battle, we will be fighting
seriously. Is that acceptable?

rows.label: qst201701_msg0029
rows.name: Of course, sir!

rows.label: qst201701_msg0032
rows.name: Then our elites will be your opponents.

rows.label: qst201701_msg0033
rows.name:
Mattragh, you're in too! Fight as
if you're learning from a master!

rows.label: qst201701_msg0034
rows.name: Whaaaat?!

rows.label: qst201701_msg0035
rows.name:
Now, come at me with
all you've got, sir!
